text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @EsperDoD @SecPompeo we have dogs trained to sniff out Cancer drugs and dead bodies. when are we going to have some dogs that can find covid-19 carriers. Or is this already being done. https://t.co/m1FaSRm0F3
